long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing QuoteBoat - the ultimate productivity and motivation tool for your web browsing experience. Tired of getting sidetracked by distracting websites? QuoteBoat lets you create a personalized blocklist of sites you want to avoid, and soft-blocks them with an inspiring quote overlay that uplifts your mood and boosts your productivity.

But we understand that sometimes you may need to access those sites, which is why QuoteBoat is flexible enough to let you unblock any site with a single click. Plus, with a fresh motivational quote every time you try to visit a blocked site, QuoteBoat helps you stay focused, inspired, and on track towards your goals.

So what are you waiting for? Download QuoteBoat now and take control of your web browsing experience with motivation and productivity at your fingertips.
